articles.title: My First E3: Exploring the Show Floor - IGN Video
articles.description: The bright lights, ground-shaking sound and bags of swag are a bit too much for our boy Rory.

articles.author: Jordan Sirani
articles.title: E3 2017: New Xbox Live Avatars Arriving Later This Year - IGN
articles.description: New Avatar system adds more customization, ditches gender restrictions on clothing.

articles.author: Jon Ryan
articles.title: E3 2017: Beyond Good and Evil 2 Is a Massively Ambitious RPG - IGN
articles.description: We sat down with the development team of Beyond Good & Evil 2 to learn about their new engine and the concepts they want to implement in the game.

articles.author: Alex Osborn
articles.title: E3 2017: Nintendo on Switch Virtual Console: 'We Recognize There's an Appetite' - IGN
articles.description: Reggie Fils-Aime shed light on the future of My Nintendo and the company's plan for delivering legacy content.

articles.title: 9 Minutes of Sushi Striker Gameplay - E3 2017 - IGN Video
articles.description: Nintendo Treehouse showed off gameplay from the upcoming 3DS title, Sushi Striker: The Way of Sushido!

articles.author: Evan Campbell
articles.title: E3 2017: Nintendo Working to Scale Up Switch Production - IGN
articles.description: Reggie Fils-Aime talks to us about what the company is doing to make sure everyone can find the hybrid system.

articles.title: 10 Minutes of Observer Gameplay - E3 2017 - IGN Video
articles.description: Head into the cyberpunk like world of Observer for a cerebral horror adventure.

articles.title: Sushi Striker: The Way of Sushido Official Trailer - E3 2017 - IGN Video
articles.description: This plate-smacking action puzzle game comes to Nintendo 3DS next year.

articles.title: Mario + Rabbids Kingdom Battle: Fighting Rabbid Kong  - E3 2017 - IGN Video
articles.description: Nintendo Treehouse showed off a portion of the first boss fight in Mario + Rabbids Kingdom Battle!

articles.title: Injustice 2 Official Introducing Sub-Zero Trailer - IGN Video
articles.description: The Mortal Kombat fighter is ready to take on DC superheroes and supervillains.
